revisions.rev:
The '''1960 NFL Expansion Draft''' was a National Football League (NFL) draft in which a new [[expansion team]], named the [[Dallas Cowboys]],<ref>Initially the team was called the [[Dallas Cowboys#History|Dallas Rangers]].</ref> selected its first players. The NFL awarded [[Dallas, Texas]] a franchise to compete for revenue with [[Lamar Hunt|Lamar Hunt's]] [[Kansas City Chiefs|Dallas Texans]] of the upstart [[American Football League]].<ref name=FWST>{{cite news|title=From meager beginnings to Americaâs Team|date=2008-02-15|last=Buck|first=Ray|work=Fort Worth Star-Telegram}}</ref> The Dallas expansion franchise was approved too late for it to participate in the [[1960 NFL Draft]].<ref name=FWST/> The Cowboys are the only NFL expansion team to not have had the benefit of a college draft in its first year.<ref name=FWST/>
So that the Cowboys could become competitive with existing teams, the league gave them the opportunity to select current players from existing teams. That selection was provided by the expansion draft, held on March 13, [[1960 NFL season|1960]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.cowboysplus.com/classic/recordbook/draft/1960/index.html|title=Cowboys draft for 1960|accessdate=2008-09-22 |publisher=Dallas Morning News}}</ref> In this draft, the Cowboys chose thirty-six players from the existing twelve teams.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.profootballhof.com/history/release.jsp?release_id=1450|title=Pro Football History |accessdate=2008-09-22 |publisher=Pro Football Hall of Fame}}(listed as the Dallas Rangers)</ref> The NFL also assigned the rights to 1960 NFL Draft picks [[Don Meredith]] (who had been drafted by the [[Chicago Bears]]) and [[Don Perkins]] (drafted by the [[Indianapolis Colts|Baltimore Colts]]) to the Cowboys for a couple of future draft picks.<ref name=FWST/>
Twenty-two players made the active roster that season. Eleven players played only one year with Dallas. Eight players (including [[Jack Patera]], who was injured early in the 1961 season) played in 1960 and 1961. The three remaining players from the draft started for several years, including: [[Bob Fry]], Tackle, 1960-64; [[Jerry Tubbs]], Linebacker, 1960-66; and [[Franklin Clarke|Frank Clarke]], Wide Receiver, 1960-67.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.knowyourdallascowboys.com/2006/08/29/1960-expansion-draft/|title=1960 Expansion Draft|accessdate=2008-09-22 |date=2008-09-28|archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20090105160119/http://www.knowyourdallascowboys.com/2006/08/29/1960-expansion-draft/ |archivedate = January 05, 2009|deadurl=yes}} </ref>
==Rules of the Draft== Every existing NFL team listed nine players, and the Cowboys selected three players on the list from each team.
==Player Selections==
The players in '''bold''' made the active roster of the Cowboys in 1960.
